mdRecord.dcterms:description: "... 1902-3 and 1910. By Edwin T Hall as a memorial to those formerly of Dulwich College (Old Alleynians) killed in the South African War. Lower addition to rear of 1910 by E Stanley Hall in tribute to Canon James Carver, first head of the school on its refoundation..." -- http://www.britishlistedbuildings.co.uk/en-470818-the-old-library-dulwich-college-greater-#.VVtlaUivwvo [work]
